short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help the snake grow by collecting all the objects appearing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This game is very familiar to us. And the rules it is also very simple: use the arrow keys, you control a snake, which would devour everything in its path. Of course, tightly dinner, it will increase in size and then you would have to show the utmost attention not to eat its own tail. In the game there are several levels and you can choose them according to your desire.
